pr_title: [FLINK-20470]MissingNode can't be casted to ObjectNode when deserializing JSON

timeline.message: [FLINK-20470]MissingNode can't be casted to ObjectNode when deserializing JSON

timeline.bodyText: I think this is a little hack. This can't handle nested types. Would be better fix this in org.apache.flink.formats.json.JsonToRowDataConverters#wrapIntoNullableConverter. And call JsonToRowDataConverters#createConverter in the constructor.
timeline.author: wuchong

replies.bodyText: Thanks for your suggestion,i'll update it
replies.author: zhuxiaoshang

timeline.message: [FLINK-20470]MissingNode can't be casted to ObjectNode when deserializing JSON

timeline.bodyText: Would be better to use jsonNode.isMissingNode() here.
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.message: [FLINK-20470]MissingNode can't be casted to ObjectNode when deserializing JSON
